# Example of use
# After the workflow completes, navigate to the run in the GitHub Actions tab and download the clue-results artifact. You may also add an additional step using actions/download-artifact in a subsequent job to retrieve the artifact programmatically.

name: Run CLUE2

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    permissions:
      packages: write
      contents: read 
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Login to GitHub Container Registry
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          registry: ghcr.io
          username: ${{ github.actor }}
          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

      - name: Runs CLUE to test the ...
        uses: clue2-sose25/Clue2/.github/actions/clue-deployer@v0
        with:
          clue-config-path: ./clue/clue-config.yaml
          sut-config-path: ./clue/toystore-config.yaml
          image-registry: ghcr.io/clue2-sose25/sustainable_toystore
          variants-name: baseline
          results-path: clue_results
          kubeconfig: ${{ secrets.KUBECONFIG_B64 }}
          patch-local-cluster: 'true'
